headline: BofA Sees Execution Strength in Colgate (CL), Modestly Trims Price Target to $98
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is one of the best defensive stocks to invest in according to analysts. On August 4, Bank of America Securities analyst Peter Galbo reiterated a Buy rating on Colgate-Palmolive, while lowering the price target from $105 to $98. His revised target follows the company’s Q2 results, which broadly met expectations and reflected signs […]
